TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {64293=Brown University Athletics | 235 Hope St. Box 1932 | Providence, RI 02912, 22336=2012: Played in 16 games, starting three … Finished the year with three points (1g, 1a) … Earned an assist on the game-winning goal in 1-0 win over New Hampshire … Scored in nationally televised 2-2 tie with Yale … Took 10 shots on the season, six of which were on goal … 2011: Recipient of the team’s Dobson-Kay Coaches’ Award … Played in all 17 games, starting three … Finished second on the team in scoring with 11 points (4g, 3a) … Recorded 33 shots, including 13 on goal … Scored against Coastal Carolina, Vermont, Sacred Heart, and Harvard … Also had an assist against Coastal Carolina for a three-point game … 2010: Played in all 17 games, earning significant time off the bench … Helped to lead team to a 2-1 upset over #22 Monmouth with the first two goals of her career, including the game-winner … Earned Ivy League Rookie of the Week and was a CollegeSoccer360.com Primetime Performer of the Week following the win over the Hawks … Before Brown: A four-year starter at Judge Memorial Catholic, Berg also ran track for four years … Named All-State in soccer all four years of high school … The Rookie of the Year for her soccer team in 2006-07, Berg was also named Best Offensive Player, scoring eight goals … Helped to lead her track team that year to a 3A State Championship, while setting the Utah state record for the Medley Relay … Named Best Offensive Player for soccer in 2007-08, scoring nine goals, while helping to lead the team to a 3A State Championship … Track team won its second straight 3A State Championship during her sophomore year, while Berg was the State Runner-Up in the 100, 200, and 400 … Earned her third straight Best Offensive Player Award for soccer as a junior, scoring 14 goals and was named Track MVP in 2008-09 … Was MVP for both soccer and track in 2009-10, scoring 21 goals for the soccer team … Played club soccer for Impact United Soccer Club … Honor Roll student in high school … Personal: The daughter of Robert and Cynthia Berg, Kiersten has one brother, Erik … Concentrating in Cognitive Neuroscience.     }
